with that <clr:0000>picture of a geoglyph<clr:ffff>?
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Listen. How about getting your own ring
garland from <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>? Then you
can attack it as much as you want.
It's a ways away in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff> to
the southeast.
Deliver00: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Which horse do you want to take out?
Advice01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>If you're riding on a road, your horse
will just naturally follow the path, as is
its instinct.
Travel by road if you want to leave the
steering up to your steed and just enjoy
the scenery!
Talk9021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>In the Eldin region...<sp:5:1:0>of northeast Hyrule...<sp:5:1:0>
there is a place called Woodland Stable...

Go there...<sp:5:1:0>and bring the musical troupe
back together...<sp:5:1:0>to receive the Great
Fairies' blessings...
Advice02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>If a horse gets spooked or doesn't like
where it's at, it might shut down and
refuse to move at all.
If that happens, you can <clr:0000>target<clr:ffff> while
mounted and then force the horse to
<clr:0000>move step by step<clr:ffff>.
Just be sure you don't put your horse
in a dangerous situation.
Advice03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>To talk to someone while on horseback,<sp:5:0:0>
just <clr:0000>target<clr:ffff> them first.

But you won't be able to talk to anyone
if you're riding too fast, so slow it down.
Deliver03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>All right, we'll take <clr:0000><sp:2:3:0><clr:ffff> into
our care. Wait right here.
Advice04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>If you get separated from your horse,
<sp:5:0:0>just <clr:0000>whistle<clr:ffff> and it'll come running.
Deliver04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, that's all I can do for you. Thanks for
using the stable, pal.
Advice05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Horses that have lots of <clr:0000>stamina<clr:ffff> can
run at top speed for a long time.

However, they can't turn well when
they're running at top speed.

If your horse can't turn sharply, you're
more likely to hit obstacles, so think
before you ask your horse to sprint.
Explain1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>As a reward for 30 points, you can now
register an additional horse!

If there's a wild horse that catches your
fancy, please bring it to us.
Explain1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>For 26 points, you get an extravagant
saddle!
Deliver07:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>All right, we'll get <clr:0000><sp:2:3:0><clr:ffff>
ready for you. Sit tight.
Talk9028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>Once a century...<sp:5:1:0>a golden horse is born...<sp:5:1:0>


You may find it in the northwest...<sp:5:1:0>by going
to Snowfield Stable...
Explain1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>As a reward for 35 points, you can now
register an additional horse!

If there's a wild horse that catches your
fancy, please bring it to us.
Explain1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>As a reward for <sp:2:e:42:3c0048006f0072007300650049006e006e005f00470065007400480061006c006600500072006900630065005f0050006f0069006e0074004e0075006d00ffff00cd> <sp:c9:6:1c:0a0070006f0069006e0074000c0070006f0069006e00740073000000>, all stable fees
will be permanently...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><sp:0:2:2:7d00>FIFTY!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>PERCENT!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>OFF!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Quite a rupee-saver, eh?<sp:5:0:0> With that kind
of discount, you'll be able to use our
facilities that much more!
Explain1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>It comes with the traveler's bridle,
so here's that too.
Explain1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>It comes with the extravagant bridle,
so here's that as well.
Talk506: You want to switch equipment, right?
Explain1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>You saved up another <clr:0000>five points<clr:ffff>, so I'll
give you three <clr:0000>endura carrots<clr:ffff>!
Register00_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>AAAH! <sp:5:0:0>What theâ€” <sp:5:0:0>What is that thing?
Why are its eyes...glowing?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Sorry, buddy... This is a stable for horses,
not nightmares.
Explain1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>For five points, you get the horse-god
fabric!
KyoukaiTalk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Isn't this the golden horse that used
to belong to Princess Zelda? <sp:5:1:0>Do you want
to register it?
Register00_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Not a problem. Let me justâ€”


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh, for the love of Hylia... That's not
a horse!

We only board horses here, stranger.
No exceptions.
Talk9040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for <clr:0000>hot buttered apple<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>a dish
of fresh apples...<sp:5:1:0>cooked in goat butter...

Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will
enhance your horse's abilities...
KyoukaiTalk04_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oho!<sp:5:0:0> What a splendid horse. Do you want
to register it?
Register00_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Wait a second...<sp:5:1:0> Your horse!


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Is this the <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff> that ran away
from <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>?!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I appreciate you wanting to board such a
beauty with us, but...

Shouldn't you return it to its rightful
owner at Snowfield Stable?

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I'm sure they'll be grateful. <sp:5:1:0>They must be
worried sick!
Talk9041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>In Hyrule Ridge...<sp:5:1:0>atop Thundra Plateau...<sp:5:1:0>
there sits a dragon tree...

There, many excellent steeds...<sp:5:1:0>roam wild
and free...
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thanks to you, I have a stunning picture
of a geoglyph here in my stable.

Perhaps by spreading awareness of these
odd phenomena, we can help unravel the
mystery of their creation.
Talk9042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>In Faron Grasslands...<sp:5:1:0>there is a place
called Zokassa Ridge...

There, many excellent steeds...<sp:5:1:0>roam wild
and free...
Talk9043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>On the border separating Necluda's
east from its west...<sp:5:1:0>there is a place
called Bubinga Forest...
There, many excellent steeds...<sp:5:1:0>roam wild
and free...
Talk9044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for <clr:0000>veggie cream soup<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
a meal made with carrots or pumpkins...<sp:5:1:0>
cooked in rock salt...<sp:5:1:0>and fresh milk...
Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will

Talk9045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for <clr:0000>carrot stew<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>a meal made

with Tabantha wheat...<sp:5:1:0>and fresh milk...
Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will

Talk9046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for <clr:0000>cream of vegetable soup<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
a meal made by simmering vegetables
in fresh milk...<sp:5:1:0>with a pinch of rock salt...
Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will
enhance your horse's abilities...
Register10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Your horse is safe with us!<sp:5:0:0> Thanks for
using the stable.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How about <clr:0000>changing <clr:ffff>its gear? If you want
to tow anything, I'd recommend a saddle
with a <clr:0000>harness <clr:ffff>attached.
Talk9047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for <clr:0000>glazed veggies<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>a meal
of fresh vegetables...<sp:5:1:0>cooked in sweet
courser bee honey...
Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will
enhance your horse's abilities...
Register11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I see.<sp:5:0:0> Parting is never easy...


<sp:3:0:2:0100>But please rest assured.


Your horse will be treated with great care
by the Stable Association.
Take1054: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Gotcha.<sp:5:0:0> I'll give it a regular saddle.
Talk9048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for <clr:0000>steamed tomatoes<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>a meal
of tender Hylian tomato...<sp:5:1:0>cooked with
other vegetables...
Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will
enhance your horse's abilities...
TalkHatu_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to my <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>. We deal in all
things horse related. We also double
as an inn.
Hm... It seems you're not a <clr:0000>member<clr:ffff> yet.
Register12:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> So you don't want to register this
wild horse? Gotcha.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Bear in mind that if you save up your
Pony Points, you may be <clr:0000>entitled to
register more horses<clr:ffff>.
We look forward to your continued
patronage of the Stable Association.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you attach a <clr:0000>harness<clr:ffff> to a stable <clr:0000>wagon<clr:ffff>,
you can transport bulky materials.
Talk9049:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I am Malanya...<sp:5:1:0>the god of horses...


<snd:TalkPositive>I hunger...<sp:5:1:0>for a <clr:0000>vegetable omelet<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>a meal
made with vegetables and bird eggs...<sp:5:1:0>
cooked in goat butter...<sp:5:1:0>and rock salt...
Bring me the food I crave...<sp:5:1:0>and I will
enhance your horse's abilities...
TalkHatu_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Then allow me to explain.


You can board your horse companions
with us,<sp:5:0:0> and then summon them as you
please from our network of stables.
You may have come across <clr:0000>wild horses<clr:ffff>
during your travels...

<snd:TalkPositive>If you catch one and ride it here
to register it,<sp:5:0:0> it will become your
horse companion.
There's a limit to how many horses you
can board, but you're able to swap them
in and out as you please.
Register13: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Please give this little one a fitting name.
Bell0001: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Ah!<sp:5:1:0> Yes.<sp:5:0:0> I'll be right with you.
TalkHatu_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's simple enough. To catch a wild horse,
just approach it from behindâ€”<sp:5:0:0>slowly, so it
doesn't hear you comingâ€”and hop on.
If you really want to be sneaky, approach
it while <clr:0000>crouching<clr:ffff>.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Um...<sp:5:1:0> You don't have any horses <clr:0000>nearby<clr:ffff>.
None that you've registered, at least.
Bell0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You'd like to get your Pony Points
reward, right?
Register15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hang on... I said <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>, didn't I?
You don't have enough.

My stable doesn't run on whinnies and
good intentions. I need funds!

Sorry, but you'll have to register with us
another time. <sp:5:0:0>So...
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You don't have the necessary funds, Link.<sp:5:1:0>
I'm afraid that you can't stay unless you
pay the full amount.
Register16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I see... That's too bad. It really is a
splendid horse.
Talk8050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Our stable uses the Stable Association's
<clr:0000>membership system<clr:ffff>, so you'll need to
register if you want to use it.
May I ask for your name?
Bell0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm sorry, but only stable members can
use this.

If you want to register as a member,
go to the <clr:0000>counter<clr:ffff> and ask.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>The regular bed, right? When would you
like to be woken up?
Register17:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Well then, I'll move on to the
registration process.

First, please enter a name for your horse.
Talk8051:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait!<sp:5:1:0> What am I thinking?<sp:0:4:0>I completely forgot to explain how
<clr:0000>Pony Points <clr:ffff>work!
TalkHatu_07:
<snd:TalkPositive>Of course, these are <clr:0000>wild animals <clr:ffff>we're
talking about. The horse you're riding
might start to act up.
If that happens, try soothing it. It will
eventually settle down,<sp:5:0:0> and then you
can bring it to me.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now, it may take a while for wild horses to
get used to being ridden.

They may change directions or slow
down on their own until you earn their
trust and respect.
If your horse disobeys your direction,<sp:5:0:0>
you'll want to gently redirect it, and
then calm it.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>And if you continue interacting that way,
your horse will naturally begin to trust
you and become more obedient.
Register18:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Speaking of which...<sp:5:1:0> Do you know
about whistling?

<sp:3:0:2:0100>If you get separated from your horse, you
can whistle and it will come running!
Talk8052:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>That's right!<sp:5:0:0> It's a reward system you can
use at stables. In short, <clr:0000>every time you
use a service<clr:ffff>, you get points.
No matter what stable you go to, you can
get points for <clr:0000>lodging <clr:ffff>there, <clr:0000>registering
a horse<clr:ffff>, stuff like that.
TalkHatu_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, would you like me to tell you about
the <clr:0000>stable system<clr:ffff>?
Register19:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>But your horse isn't magic. It can't hear
you if you're too far away, so do keep
that in mind!
Take1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for waiting!<sp:5:0:0> I removed that
harness for you.
Talk8053:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Is that right?<sp:5:0:0> Then I won't bore you by
explaining it all over again.
Take1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please ask whenever you feel like
changing your horse's <clr:0000>gear<clr:ffff>!
Talk8055:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Link,<sp:5:0:0> welcome to our <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>!


If you catch a wild horse and bring it
here, you can register it.

Please visit the inside counter if you want
to <clr:0000>lodge<clr:ffff> with us.

<snd:TalkPositive>Now,<sp:5:0:0> how can I help you?
Bell0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You'll receive a towing harness! Very
useful item. You can use it to hook up
your horse to various things.
Register04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Now with that settled, I can register this
new horse you've brought.
Talk8058:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome, Link!<sp:5:0:0> Do you want to register
a horse? Or take one out for a ride?

How can I help?
Custom001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, what would you like to do?<sp:0:4:0>Give your horse a harness? Put on a new
saddle or bridle? Restyle its mane?
Talk8059:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for your continued
patronage, Link!

Do you want to register a horse? Take
one out for a ride?<sp:5:0:0> How can I help?
QuestionTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Glad to help.<sp:5:1:0> What would you like to
know about horses?
Talk8002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Link.<sp:5:1:0> All right, Mr. Link...<sp:5:1:0> There.


You're all signed up.
QuestionTalk_02: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Anything else I can clarify for you?
Register30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see you've got a <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff>
attached. What do you want to do?
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>All the stable owners were given free
rein over what to put in those frames,
so I thought and thought about it...<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then I had an idea.<sp:5:0:0> Lady Impa visited
here a while back, and she told me about
these <clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>things.
They showed up all over Hyruleâ€”there's
even one <clr:0000>near this stable<clr:ffff>. I'd love to paint
a picture of that one.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Unfortunately, since it's so big, I can't get
a <clr:0000>panoramic view <clr:ffff>of the thing. I don't
even know what it's meant to depict.
But I'd settle for a decent <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>of
the <clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>to base my painting on.
QuestionTalk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice>Oh, no problem. I'm happy to repeat
myself as many times as you need me to.
Register31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you'd like, you can also <clr:0000>change <clr:ffff>certain
things about your horse.

You can't restyle your horse's mane yet,<sp:5:0:0>
but you can equip it with a harness or a
different saddle or bridle.
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Do you have a <clr:0000>picture of
the geoglyph<clr:ffff>?
Register32:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Thank you, Link.<sp:0:4:0>As a patron of the stables, we're offering
you a <clr:0000>half-price discount on all fees<clr:ffff> at
our inn.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That also makes registering a horse only
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>. How does that sound?
Bell0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh. Oh my. This is big. All <clr:0000>stable fees<clr:ffff>
will be permanently...

<sp:0:2:2:7d00>FIFTY!


PERCENT!


OFF!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you heard about the mysterious
<clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff> that appeared all over Hyrule?
There's one <clr:0000>near <clr:ffff>this stable.
Well, I'd like to paint a picture of one and
hang it up for my customers to see.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But since they're so big, I can't get a
good enough view to paint one.
Register33:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hey,<sp:5:0:0> you don't seem to have <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>.


Taking care of horses has its costs, you
know. Sorry, you'll have to register your
horse another time.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> You painted a picture of
a <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>?!
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You don't have the necessary funds.<sp:5:1:0> I'm
afraid that even you can't stay unless you
pay the full amount.
Register34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you'd like, you can also equip your
horse withâ€”
Custom007: <snd:TalkPositive>Would you like to change anything else?
Bell0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The horse-god fabric will be yours!


That's a one-of-a-kind item you can
bring to the <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>dye shop<clr:ffff>
over in Necluda.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I sure wish I could see a <clr:0000>panoramic view<clr:ffff>
of a <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>...
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>If you sleep in a Malanya bed, not only
will you wake up <clr:0000>more energized<clr:ffff>...

Malanya, the horse god, may also <clr:0000>share
a mystical message<clr:ffff>. It's a very popular
choice among our customers.
Want to try it? If you do, when would you
like to be woken up?
Register35:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>And I don't think this steed would want
me to mess with its mane either.
Custom008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What would you like to do?


You can't restyle your horse's mane yet,
but you can equip it with a harness or
change its saddle or bridle.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you happen to have <clr:0000>a picture of a
geoglyph<clr:ffff>, please do show me!
